page.title: 01Rogart - Introduction
page.content:
Rogart, Sutherland - Introduction
The area of Rogart, which we are studying is a block - 4km by 3km - grid reference 02720903.
Rogart is a very small village (population 145). The A839, a double-track road, passes through the village. All other roads in the area are single-track with passing places.
Rogart is a rural community set in a valley. One side of the valley is covered with a Forestry Commission forest, while the other side is crofting land. The centre of the valley contains fertile farming land.
